website_summaries.verdict: One of the better alternatives to smaller value kick pads available for beginners or intermediate students.
pros: Medium-size profile strikes a good balance between being too heavy and too light
Padding is firm enough to absorb most impacts, protecting the body and limbs from harm
Size offers simple cleaning and storage
cons: Kick pad may start to develop tears and dents over time with heavy use

website_summaries.verdict: Lower in price than competitors but equal in quality and will last years if taken care of properly.
pros: This bag is good for advanced martial artists and comfortable to hold for sparring partners during practice
The heaviness will help absorb the blows while assisting with precision and comfort
cons: Bag is stiff and takes a long time to break in

customer_reviews.title: They are beautiful and they seem very well-made
customer_reviews.text: They are beautiful and they seem very well-made. But, after 36 years of training I, and all the black belts who train with me, have come to prefer a more realistic feel in a bag. This one is extremely hard and while it might break in eventually, it might not or not soon enough. Since I ordered one and if I liked it would order 5 more, I just did not want to chance it. For those who are OK kicking an extremely hard back (for the kicker and the holder), everything else about it seems well-made so I still gave it 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: My 20 year old son is a black belt in karate and I was looking for training equipment for him. Many of the other kick pads said they were suitable for training in a variety of sports like basketball, football, etc. I needed something that was specifically for karate and able to withstand major force. This pad seems like it will last forever. It is large, hard, and absorbs the force of his punches and kicks. I don't look forward to when he asks me to hold it, but I can do it without getting hurt! It is well sewn, and has very sturdy handles. It was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Woosam

customer_reviews.title: Does the job perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this with my workout partner and we both agree it is a great product. It is comfortable to be the shielded person. The handles are generous in size and soft on the skin, yet strong. The shield itself is hard and stiff, yet keeps you from injuring yourself as you kick it or punch it. Fits my requirements and is a welcomed addition to my Dojo.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Yogi

customer_reviews.title: Shield Yourself from Hurt
customer_reviews.text: If you plan to do a lot of kicking drills and other high impact striking this shield is a most have. And this bad boy is like butter in the hand of a training with a heavy landing kicker delivering the shots. I've use a few types and so far this stands the tales, time & use. All around very good quality, good stitching and the material is soft enough but firm to take the shots. Looked over dozens of reviews online and all kinds of shield pads. Ii feel this is the most value for the price and it gets the job.
customer_reviews.author: kokcaladin

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this going on two years now. It gets used daily by lots of people, including some real heavy hitters (the type that could kick down oak trees) The covering has not faded nor shown any signs of wear or damage. The handles are amazing. Rope covered in a leather make them durable and comfortable. These do soften over time making it easier to hold. FYI it doesn’t soften much. Which is yet another plus.
customer_reviews.author: S. Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Great product, no cons... (update, a small con to me...)
customer_reviews.text: >>01/19/2016 Kind of smelly when new, a synthetic smell :) It's kinda heavy(heavier than the Tiger Claw brand), well designed, solid grips and thick padding. My 8 yr old son loves it. I asked my son to hold it to let me kick it, he refused worrying that I'll kick it too hard and knock him over. Great product. >>03/30/2016 Comparing this to the Tiger Claw brand at the martial art class, this padding is a bit too stiff, especially for a younger kid. I kick it myself and it feels stiff to the point where it hurts a little. Still, I'm not gonna knock off any stars, it IS well made, wish the padding was not so stiff.
customer_reviews.author: BZB

customer_reviews.title: High-quality great price
customer_reviews.text: As a master defensive tactics instructor I need high quality merchandise this flit the bill. If you’re looking for a high-quality kick bad this is the one you need
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Well designed, solid feel, and can take a beating!
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing martial arts for over twenty five years, and have owned many pads, but this is my favorite. Why? The contour and handle locations are ergonomically perfect and help novices hole the shield correctly, and the size and padding offer excellent coverage and protection, as well as a nice solid target, which is very important for correct technique, especially for punches. Even against full power kicks, you feel next to nothing. Very high quality, I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: S. Colegrove

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, sturdy and good for punching or kicking
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag, it feels well made and high quality. Its good for punching and kicking and can be rather versatile. Its good for most adults and even kids can use it. Its not too heavy, but not too light either. The handle placements make it so that you can hold it in a variety of ways. My only gripe is that each handle is held on by 3 rivets at each end. It seems the rivets are connected to the leather around the body of the bag, so I can envision those ripping one day with enough hits or being used by someone really powerful. But so far so good and it more than meets my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: For years I’ve used the everlast style kick shields. Recently I’ve started to train with amateur & pro fighters. The kick shields just tore at the seam or wouldn’t protect. I’d wake up bruised up. Ordered this and it definitely impressed me. We’re HARD on it too!!!
customer_reviews.author: Adam D.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great operates ok...
customer_reviews.text: Asthetics of this bag do not let you down! However, don’t rely on this bag for heavy kicks, my arms n legs were sore from using this. Cool for light work not the best for 100% striking though. Expected a little more for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Margarita

customer_reviews.title: It smells like a military surplus store
customer_reviews.text: It smells like a military surplus store. It is very dense. It is almost as dense and hard as a tight-heavy-bag. Because of this, strikes do transfer to the holder. I wish it had four handles. But, it is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: My husband luved it
customer_reviews.text: My husband luv's it, he uses it with his friends, he used to be a kick boxer, and he uses it several times a week training some friends how to kick properly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: My younger son practiced using this pad every other night for his kicks and punches on Tae Kwon Do. This pad really absorbed the kicks and punches really well. It's a great size. Not too big or small for a 12 year old kid or younger. The handles are really well made.
customer_reviews.author: Randy O.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: I like it. It’s strong and sturdy. Padding is thick.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE ONE YOU WANT!
customer_reviews.text: My Son said this product was the best quality he's seen. I'm his mom and held the bag ONE TIME to let him try it out. Even though he kicked lightly I was very happy to have had a durable, solid and heavy bag between me and his kick! He and his friends will love it. The handles are really good quality, I didn't expect such a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TC CULLEN

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for any age
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction. Perfect amount of cushioning and not too hard. It works great for both my 7 y/o daughter and me. The only reason I did not give it 5 stars is because it needed better packaging. It came with the box partially open with the liner around the bag ripped - yep, the bag had a big black scuff mark, but really who cares as I will be scuffing it up anyway.
customer_reviews.author: DrJ

customer_reviews.title: An awesome bag!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome. I've used the bags featured on Amazon that cost a few dollars less, and I have to tell you -- the few extra bucks for this one are really worth it. The padding is thicker. The handles are better and more solidly attached. Just pay a few extra bucks to get this vastly superior bag.
customer_reviews.author: William Zeitler

customer_reviews.title: Solid, worth it for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am looking forward to using this for years to come. I can kick it full force and the receiver doesn't feel it. Great construction, Much training to be had!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great materials and craftmandhip
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Made with the best materials and attention to details. I am a Taekwondo and Hapkido practitioner and I can say that this product can take a beating and minimizes the transfer of force to the person holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Socialsciencedoctor

customer_reviews.title: Great design and weight for hard kicks
customer_reviews.text: Perfect handles and weight. Train my sons and they can kick this bag with full power. Seemingly indestructible.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shield
customer_reviews.text: An absolute unit of a shield. I can practice full power Muay Thai kicks with an opponent as I do on a heavy bag. A must buy for any MMA enthusiast!
customer_reviews.author: Rayan Harmouch

customer_reviews.title: Good kicking shield
customer_reviews.text: Good kicking shield. Not too heavy to hold. Dense to take in the strongest kick. Will buy more in the future
customer_reviews.author: C Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Look no further. This is the bag you want.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and great price. This is a good size and density. Some may find the padding a little hard-soften your strike just a bit to compensate if this is a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Max H.

customer_reviews.title: Seems well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid. Looks good. Sturdy for my 6 year old and 10 year old. A little heavy but the kids manage well.
customer_reviews.author: Public Name

customer_reviews.title: Top notch quality, well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Supreme quality! My Husband and Son use this for training and are very happy with the price and product! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Elizabeth Huggins

customer_reviews.title: Using it to train my 6 and 8 yr old ...
customer_reviews.text: Using it to train my 6 and 8 yr old for kicks and punches for their martial arts training. Appears high quality and durable. Off gassing is a minor problem, leave outside for a few good-weather days after opening.
customer_reviews.author: Osteodoc

customer_reviews.title: Great kicking pad
customer_reviews.text: Really nice kicking pad. Much sturdier than I thought it would be but not overly bulky/heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Trigger HappyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: WOW SUPER FAST DELIVERY
customer_reviews.text: WOW SUPER FAST DELIVERY! THE PRODUCT IS AWESOME ITS LARGE HAS GOOD WEIGHT GOOD QAULITY. IT'S PERFECT FOR MY DAUGHTER'S KARATE PRACTICE. THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Heavier than expected; more padded and durable than several others I've had in the past. This is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: I love my Combat kicking shield
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend that bought a Century one and it is junk. I love my Combat kicking shield. It's durable and we'll made. I recommend this shield to everyone. I just can't say enough good things about it. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 boys use this for their Tang Soo Do practice, they love it. The quality is great - good weight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Really high qaulity. Thick. My son's and I use it for karate training. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Surber

customer_reviews.title: This is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I used to teach martial arts and wanted to teach my kids at home now. This is the same pad I used to use. Solid. Heavy duty.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good pad. I've had it a year and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good pad. I've had it a year and it can really take a stomping. It gives good protection and a good price, you can't go wrong here.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Gift for teens to practice Krav-maga. Perfect for defense, made well.
customer_reviews.author: Neema T

customer_reviews.title: Good solid pad
customer_reviews.text: Good solid pad, seems like it will take a beating and last a long time. Pad is a little bit smaller than I thought but still fine.
customer_reviews.author: C. Cannone

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is nothing short of amazing. Durable, comfortable, has well placed handles, and excellent contouring for accurate strikes. Holds up and protects from even the strongest kicks. Would gladly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good quality for the price. given the smaller size works better for junior (8-13 year old) fighters.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable.
customer_reviews.text: High quality, very durable. I'm certain this will last many classes. The handles are a little bulky, but are flexible, so they don't have to dig in to your body when holding the target. I appreciate that the handles are riveted in, instead of stitched. I hate ordering targets, and I was positively surprised by this one. I will order more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: I have had the bag for almost a month. I am a heavyweight with some powerful leg and body kicks and so far the bag has been able to take the punishment without any signs of breaking down or falling apart! I would suggest this product to any one starting out due to the level of protection not only for the person kicking but also the person holding the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY KICK PAD
customer_reviews.text: I bought a century kick pad from Sports Chalet about 5 years ago and it was very cheaply made. I feel like it did the job but just felt like a piece of foam, pretty much like a giant pillow. This pad feels like it's made for a real man. it is very heavy duty the handles are riveted that has a really good weight to it.
customer_reviews.author: H.S.

customer_reviews.title: Super nice and big!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big! Love it! Works great! The Boxing/Functional Training Club Hood River
customer_reviews.author: The Trainer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great kick shield for price, the third one I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Tijerina

customer_reviews.title: ... 3 different kick shields and this one is my favorite. I have the Combat Sports Thai Suit Case ...
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 different kick shields and this one is my favorite. I have the Combat Sports Thai Suit Case Kick Shield. And ASP Kick Shields, this one is better than both because it has the top handle as well as the back handles, so your partner can work on leg kicks while you hold the top handle with the pad against your thigh, as well as push kicks and knees when you hold the pad against your belly. great product!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing for stomp kicks
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing for stomp kicks, side kicks, round house kicks, and back kicks. Pad is used to increase power and tecnique if done properly. im also putting daily hard work on it and I do martial arts at a high level. 2 thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a good sturdy piece of equipment. Built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Pool guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Better than I expected. Size ideal for martial arts. I will get another if I have .
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: These pads can take hard kicks and are put together solid!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Durable and absorbs leg kicks from some heavy hitters. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: c0inman

customer_reviews.title: Great item, fair price
customer_reviews.text: I definitely like this. I will let you know how it holds up over time but the build quality is seems good upfront.
customer_reviews.author: bobson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag sturdy but has some weird smell left outside ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag sturdy but has some weird smell left outside in back yard for a few days still smells like chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Affordable martial arts pad
customer_reviews.text: Haven't started really using it yet but the pad seems to be good quality. It is a bit heavy for a child to hold. Better for an adult to hold.
customer_reviews.author: L. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: ... been in the martial arts for 42 years and love these kicking shields from Combat Sports
customer_reviews.text: I've been in the martial arts for 42 years and love these kicking shields from Combat Sports. They are heavy, durable and last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the material is great. Its heavy (8 lbs
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the material is great. Its heavy (8 lbs.) and sterdy. Handles make the pad movement holding easy!
customer_reviews.author: edward

customer_reviews.title: hard surface
customer_reviews.text: i'm first time user of the pads like this. the surface of this pad is very hard. 3 handles in the back of the pad feel like they will tear up after several months of regular use, but actually they are made very sturdy. i did not start using pad yet.
customer_reviews.author: electroniks-maniak

customer_reviews.title: Very good, can't beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Like the title says, great product for the price, we'll worth it! It takes a good beating. Came super fast!
customer_reviews.author: J. Madrigal

customer_reviews.title: it's a great product. Very durable and well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Although it takes a while to break in, it's a great product. Very durable and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: gb

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sturdy!. Much better than ones used in our ...
customer_reviews.text: Thick and sturdy!.Much better than ones used in our class.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Kick Boxing Muay thai. I've been kicking heavy bags for 2year now and my shins have been conditioned. I throw some means roundhouse and these pads can more than take the abuse. Knees, kicks, front kicks you can use it for anything. Having the right gear make all the difference. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Keo D. Phi

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality slightly curved which is a nice touch and ...
customer_reviews.text: i havent tried it yet but i can tell that the reviews are on point. excellent quality slightly curved which is a nice touch and has some weight to it. I can't wait to use it
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Great for training
customer_reviews.text: Bought for coworker who Teaches little kids and adults. He says it is well made and great to use as the teacher. He says it works great and well worth the money. No complaints = good product. He is thinking about buying several more so some of his advanced students can use with the newer ones. Easy to hold and use. Fairly lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Stinks like vinyl chemical fumes
customer_reviews.text: This thing stinks like vinyl checmical fumes. Aired it out a whole day and it still smells toxic. Returning it.
customer_reviews.author: AndNowForSomething

customer_reviews.title: HARD GOOD FOR BIG BIG GUYS WITH TUFF SHINS
customer_reviews.text: HARD HARD HARD !!!!! WAY TO HARD TO KICK FOR ME AND I SPENT TWO YEARS IN THAILAND BUT WHATEVER!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer

product_meta.title: Combat Sports Big Pad MMA Punch Shield
product_meta.description: The Combat Sports Big Pad is ideal for training kickboxing and Muay Thai techniques.
feature_bullets: Safely train leg and knee strikes with ease with this 24" tall x 17" wide x 5.5" thick punch shield
Punch and kick fight shield complete with three triple reinforced riveted handles to ensure stability
Made of durable and easy to clean synthetic leather built to uphold against hard hits in your home or commercial gym
Protect your MMA athletes while fight training with this solid focus target big pad
This target shield can hold up to abuse making it perfect for kickboxing and Muay Thai classes
